00001 #ifndef MWGUI_LAYOUTS_H
00002 #define MWGUI_LAYOUTS_H
00003 
00004 #include <components/esm_store/store.hpp>

00006 #include <openengine/gui/layout.hpp>
00007 
00008 /*
00009   This file contains classes corresponding to all the window layouts
00010   defined in resources/mygui/ *.xml.
00011 
00012   Each class inherites GUI::Layout and loads the XML file, and
00013   provides some helper functions to manipulate the elements of the
00014   window.
00015 
00016   The windows are never created or destroyed (except at startup and
00017   shutdown), they are only hid. You can control visibility with
00018   setVisible().
00019  */
00020 
00021 namespace MWGui

00024   {

00026     HUD(int width, int height)
00027       : Layout("openmw_hud_layout.xml")
00028     {
00029       setCoord(0,0, width, height);
00030

00049

00062     void setStats(int h, int hmax, int m, int mmax, int s, int smax)
00063     {
00064       health->setProgressRange(hmax);
00065       health->setProgressPosition(h);
00066       magicka->setProgressRange(mmax);
00067       magicka->setProgressPosition(m);
00068       stamina->setProgressRange(smax);
00069       stamina->setProgressPosition(s);
00070     }
00071 
00072     void setWeapIcon(const char *str)
00073     { weapImage->setImageTexture(str); }
00074     void setSpellIcon(const char *str)
00075     { spellImage->setImageTexture(str); }

00091     void setValue (const std::string& id, const MWMechanics::DynamicStat<int>& value)
00092     {
00093         static const char *ids[] =
00094         {
00095             "HBar", "MBar", "FBar",
00096             0
00097         };
00098 
00099         for (int i=0; ids[i]; ++i)
00100             if (ids[i]==id)
00101             {
00102                 switch (i)
00103                 {
00104                     case 0:
00105 
00106                       health->setProgressRange (value.getModified());
00107                       health->setProgressPosition (value.getCurrent());
00108                       break;
00109 
00110                     case 1:
00111 
00112                       magicka->setProgressRange (value.getModified());
00113                       magicka->setProgressPosition (value.getCurrent());
00114                       break;
00115 
00116                     case 2:
00117 
00118                       stamina->setProgressRange (value.getModified());
00119                       stamina->setProgressPosition (value.getCurrent());
00120                       break;
00121                 }
00122             }
00123     }
00124 
00125     MyGUI::ProgressPtr health, magicka, stamina;
00126 
00127     MyGUI::StaticImagePtr weapImage, spellImage;
00128     MyGUI::ProgressPtr weapStatus, spellStatus;
00129

00131     MyGUI::StaticImagePtr effect1;
00132 
00133     MyGUI::StaticImagePtr minimap;
00134     MyGUI::StaticImagePtr compass;
00135

00169   class StatsWindow : public OEngine::GUI::Layout
00170   {
00171   public:
00172     void setBar(const std::string& name, const std::string& tname, int val, int max)
00173     {
00174       MyGUI::ProgressPtr pt;
00175       getWidget(pt, name);
00176       pt->setProgressRange(max);
00177       pt->setProgressPosition(val);
00178 
00179       std::stringstream out;
00180       out << val << "/" << max;
00181       setText(tname, out.str().c_str());
00182     }

00219       setText("ClassText", "Pilgrim");

00228     void setValue (const std::string& id, const MWMechanics::Stat<int>& value)
00229     {
00230         static const char *ids[] =
00231         {
00232             "AttribVal1", "AttribVal2", "AttribVal3", "AttribVal4", "AttribVal5",
00233             "AttribVal6", "AttribVal7", "AttribVal8",
00234             0
00235         };
00236 
00237         for (int i=0; ids[i]; ++i)
00238             if (ids[i]==id)
00239             {
00240                 std::ostringstream valueString;
00241                 valueString << value.getModified();
00242                 setText (id, valueString.str());
00243 
00244                 if (value.getModified()>value.getBase())
00245                     setTextColor (id, 0, 1, 0);
00246                 else if (value.getModified()<value.getBase())
00247                     setTextColor (id, 1, 0, 0);
00248                 else
00249                     setTextColor (id, 1, 1, 1);
00250 
00251                 break;
00252             }
00253     }
00254 
00255     void setValue (const std::string& id, const MWMechanics::DynamicStat<int>& value)
00256     {
00257         static const char *ids[] =
00258         {
00259             "HBar", "MBar", "FBar",
00260             0
00261         };
00262 
00263         for (int i=0; ids[i]; ++i)
00264             if (ids[i]==id)
00265             {
00266                 std::string id (ids[i]);
00267                 setBar (id, id + "T", value.getCurrent(), value.getModified());
00268             }
00269     }
00270   };
